description: Deletes attributes from the currently signed-in user. For example, your application can submit a request to this operation when a user wants to remove their birthdate attribute value. Authorize this action with a signed-in user's access token. It must include the scope aws.cognito.signin.user.admin.

parameters.name: UserAttributeNames
parameters.description: An array of strings representing the user attribute names you want to delete. For custom attributes, you must prepend the custom: prefix to the attribute name, for example custom:department. (string) ---

parameters.name: AccessToken
parameters.description: A valid access token that Amazon Cognito issued to the currently signed-in user. Must include a scope claim for aws.cognito.signin.user.admin.
